hymn.title: I need Jesus, my need I now confess

layout.singingstanza: I need Je -- sus, my need I now con -- fess; No friend like Him in times of deep dis -- tress; I need Je -- sus, the need I glad -- ly own; Though some may bear their load a -- lone, Yet I need Je -- sus. I need Je -- sus, I need Je -- sus, I need Je -- sus ev -- ery day; Need Him in the sun -- shine hour, Need Him when the storm- -- clouds low'r; Ev -- ery day a -- long my way, Yes, I need Je -- sus.
